amendment.description: Amendment to the Goss amendment (A023) sought to allow continued assistance to Haiti if the President determines that the Haitian government is continuing to make progress in implementing democratic elections.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Goss amendment, printed as amendment No. 77 in the Congressional Record of June 27, 1995, to allow continued assistance to Haiti if the President of the U.S. determines that the Haitian government is continuing to make progress in implementing democratic elections.

action.text: Amendment (A024) offered by Mrs. Meek to the Goss amendment (A023).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meek amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 231 (Roll no. 436).
